Title: Called Home
Plot: Cyrus Lupo returns to New York after four years abroad to deal with his own terror. Lupo and Green investigate two suicides committed the same way. The detectives are suspicious of a parolee known as "Dr. Death".
GuestStars: Dominic Fumusa, Gerry Becker, Michael McKean, Elizabeth Marvel, Brad Dourif, Susan Blackwell, Wayne Kasserman, Marin Ireland, Richard Duva, Anthony Ventola, Lauren M. Martin, Perry Martuena, Alan Ariano, Jaime Li
